properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 27 at 6:11PM CST until January 31 at 9:02PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued
another Flood Advisory for the Tennessee River at
Savannah until the river falls below 365 feet.
This will affect Decatur and Hardin Counties...

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
the Tennessee River at Savannah
* from Monday January 27 until Friday January 31.
* At 5 PM Monday the stage was 365.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 370.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue a slow fall.
* At 366.0 feet...Campsites along Towboat Lane are flooding.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
